step_feedback.feedback: Good job closing your fingers into fists and drawing your arms in. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles during this step.
You opened your fingers and extended your arms well. Ensure you are exhaling and relaxing your muscles as you do this.
Great work on the outward arm movement and muscle relaxation. Keep up the good form.
Excellent execution of opening fingers and extending arms. Remember to exhale fully.
You completed the exercise well. Focus on maintaining consistent muscle relaxation throughout the outward movement.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles when bringing your arms in, and exhale and relax as you extend them outwards. Keep up the good work!
